scripts.build: nuxt build - Builds your application for production. This command is used to prepare your application for deployment. It will generate static files for your application in the dist folder.
scripts.dev: nuxt dev - Starts the development server. This command will start the development server for your application. It will also start a hot-reloading server on localhost:3000.
scripts.generate: nuxt generate - Generates static files for your application. This command is used to generate static files for your application. It will generate static files for your application in the dist folder.
scripts.preview: nuxt preview - Starts a preview server. This command will start a preview server for your application. It will also start a hot-reloading server on localhost:3000.
scripts.postinstall: nuxt prepare - Prepares your application for development. This command is used to prepare your application for development. It will install all necessary dependencies and set up your application for development.
